Detailed Description

Encapsulates information needed for planner to make a path.

This struct contains ALL information necessary for a single robot path to be planned.

Member Data Documentation

◆ constraints

RobotConstraints planning::PlanRequest::constraints

Angular and linear acceleration and velocity constraints on the robot.

◆ debug_drawer

rj_drawing::RosDebugDrawer* planning::PlanRequest::debug_drawer

Allows debug drawing in the world. If this is nullptr, no debug drawing should be performed.

◆ field_obstacles

rj_geometry::ShapeSet planning::PlanRequest::field_obstacles

The list of field obstacles.

◆ motion_command

MotionCommand planning::PlanRequest::motion_command

The goal to plan for.

◆ planned_trajectories

std::array<const Trajectory*, kNumShells> planning::PlanRequest::planned_trajectories

Trajectories for each of the robots that has already been planned. nullptr for unplanned robots.

◆ priority

int8_t planning::PlanRequest::priority

The priority of this plan request.

◆ shell_id

unsigned planning::PlanRequest::shell_id

The robot's shell ID. Used for debug drawing.

◆ start

RobotInstant planning::PlanRequest::start

The robot's starting state.

◆ virtual_obstacles

rj_geometry::ShapeSet planning::PlanRequest::virtual_obstacles

The list of "virtual" obstacles, generated by gameplay representing soft constraints.

◆ world_state

const WorldState* planning::PlanRequest::world_state

The state of the world, containing robot and ball states.

For obstacle-avoidance purposes, obstacles should be used instead. This can be used for lookup of robots/balls by ID.
